Tyrael was pleased. Shadow Star's records showed him to be a worthy 
junior officer.

Tyrael: As soon as our crew is complete, we will depart. I have had no 
one in mind except you and Naga, a warrior alongside whom I have 
fought. We may need two more members. As for the goal of the 
mission... I am sure you have heard of Megatron's latest escapade? Our 
 mission is to get him... and slay him. He jeopardizes the Tripredacus 
Council's influence on the Predacons. I am ready to take any means 
necessary to destroy his wicked spark!

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Shadow Star:  Of course.  I would gladly oblige.
> 
> Shadow Star thinking but not talking outloud:  FOOL DO YOU NOT 
> REALIZE THAT MY ONLY SUPERIOR IN THIS UNIVERSE IS THE INFERNO WHICH 
I 
> SERVE!  SOON YOU WILL EITHER DIE, OR BOW DOWN TO BOTH ME AND IT!
> 
> Shadow Star:  So when do we leave?  And who else have you chosen.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Sorry for not posting lately!
> > 
> > Tyrael looked at the defying robot. Of course, this was a quality 
> he 
> > looked forward to exploit. He would make a great leader... after 
> him. 
> > The only important thing was to be sure to have the black one on 
> his 
> > side.
> > 
> > Tyrael: I am glad to see you too, Shadow Star. I am here to give 
> you a 
> > command. As you might know, I have been given Gorefeast's 
position. 
> As 
> > such, I am about to embark on a mission, and the council has given 
> me 
> > free choice of my crew. I want you as my second in command. Do you 
> > agree?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > Shadow Star opened the door.  He gave an almost challengin bow.
> > > 
> > > Shadow Star: What do my (almost joking with the word) superiors 
> > > desire of me?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > >   OOC: Dewboy, have you read the Reward for incompetence post?
> > > >   
> > > >   Tyrael thought back to the ceremony of the execution. The 
> robot 
> > > he 
> > > > had looked at right after was Bleeder, Shadow Star's superior 
> > > officer. 
> > > > They had both talked, and Tyrael had explained his reason's 
for 
> > his 
> > > > choice. Bleeder had been in agreement. Now, Tyrael had to 
> announce 
> > > it 
> > > > to the principal interested...
> > > >   He went to the junior officer's quarters. He hoped the young 
> > > officer 
> > > > was there. After searching for a few minutes, he found the 
> bot's 
> > > door, 
> > > > and pressed the button announcing him.
> > > >   Tyrael: I am Colonel Tyrael. I have come to meet with you, 
> > Shadow 
> > > > Star.
